vlive.korean: 자꾸 샤워를... Why do you keep mentioning... 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : 갑 겸 브
뭐 샤워가 잘못입니까? What's wrong with showering? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : 갑 겸 브
[전 마피아가 아닌데요?? - 태양의 샤워 - 춤춰! [I'm not the mafia but] - Shower of the sun! - Dance! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [SF9] 농부 그룹 셒구의 밤에 오신 걸 환영합니다🌾 (SF9 playing the Mafia game)

vlive.korean: 샤워하면서 V LIVE 하신 적 없잖아요 그렇죠? And you've never been on V LIVE during shower, have you? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : 갑 겸 브
vlive.english: And you've never been on V LIVE during shower, have you?

vlive.korean: 일단 양치하고요 - 샤워 뭐 안 하는 사람 있습니까? I brushed the teeth. - Who doesn't take a shower? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : 갑 겸 브
vlive.english: I brushed the teeth. - Who doesn't take a shower?

examples.korean: a shower bath 발음듣기 샤워. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
She showered and dressed and went downstairs. 발음듣기 그녀는 샤워를 하고 옷을 입은 뒤 아래층으로 갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She showered and dressed and went downstairs. 발음

examples.korean: shower gel containing plant extracts that have a stimulating effect on the skin 발음듣기 피부에 활기를 주는 효과가 있는 식물 추출물이 든 샤워 젤 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: shower gel containing plant extracts that have a stimulating effect on the skin 발음

examples.korean: an invigorating walk / shower 발음듣기 활기를 북돋워 주는 산책/샤워 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
to take a bath / shower / wash 발음듣기 목욕/샤워를 하다/(몸 등을) 씻다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: to take a bath / shower / wash 발음
